about_the_game:
This DLC contains 8 new characters, all with animations and sounds. You only need to purchase DLC and install it to unlock new characters in "seek girl"!
This time there are 8 different styles of girls: sexy nurses, exotic cat girls, poor girls and so on. More girls need you to find, go play games.
Players with questions can be resolved by:
1Search group "Little White Rabbit dsgame"

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains some naked and pornographic content, All characters are over 18 years old

name: Seek Girl - Charming girl

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT 740
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Sound Device

supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese*, Polish, Thai, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean
